body:
here, 50 chapter. no need to wait any longer.
https://manhwa18.com/manga-do-it-next-door.html

If you like this, there are already 51 chapters out on this and its almost at the end of the story.  But just know that it gets so fucking stupid.  The art is nice, but its a manhwa and like 90% of them have fantastic art.  If you are just here to try and jerk off to it, then okay, but if you want to jerk off to one, go find Sexercise, Lucky Guy, Young Boss, My Kingdom or Queen Bee.  Those all have better art and much better stories.
What the fuck, I could even jerk I'm so confused
